sentences.en: Every time i suggest an idea, he blowns it to smithereens.
sentences.cn: 每次我提的建议都被他全盘否定.

sentences.en: She dashed the glass into smithereens against the wall.
sentences.cn: 她把玻璃杯撞在墙上砸得粉碎.

sentences.en: She dropped the vase and smashed it to smithereens.
sentences.cn: 她失手将花瓶摔得粉碎。

sentences.en: She kicks. She screams. She wants to smash the world to smithereens.
sentences.cn: 她踢. 她尖叫. 她想把所有东西都打得稀巴烂.

sentences.en: So many houses were been blown to smithereens in the war.
sentences.cn: 在战争期间,很多房子都被炸成废墟.

sentences.en: Some C 3 ought to be enough to blow the entire hangar to smithereens.
sentences.cn: 一些C3应该足够把飞机棚轰成渣了.

sentences.en: The glass was smashed to smithereens.
The mirror broke into splinters [ smithereens ] .
The toilet bowl was blown to smithereens.
The vase crashed onto the floor and smashed to smithereens.
sentences.cn: 花瓶落在地板上摔得粉碎.

sentences.en: They walked right into a booby-trap and got blown to smithereens.
sentences.cn: 他们正好踩上了饵雷，结果被炸得粉身碎骨。

trans.tran_cn: 小碎片，把…打（或砸等）得粉碎
trans.tran_en: If something is blown or smashed to smithereens, it breaks into very small pieces
